itunes:title: Episode 840 - Special Guest David Yuzuk
title: Episode 840 - Special Guest David Yuzuk
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Dan Hollaway and Rob Fox are joined by former police officer turned author and documentary filmmaker David Yuzuk to talk about his film and book "The Giant Killer" which details the extraordinary life of a homeless man Yuzuk met while he was a uniformed ...
itunes:summary:
Dan Hollaway and Rob Fox are joined by former police officer turned author and documentary filmmaker David Yuzuk to talk about his film and book "The Giant Killer" which details the extraordinary life of a homeless man Yuzuk met while he was a uniformed road patrolman. The homeless man, Richard Flaherty, was a decorated Vietnam veteran, a former national intelligence operative, and at 4 feet 9 inches tall was the shortest man to serve in the military this century.
